description: Y-shaped; "HERSTELLEN VON RON EHLERT IN MCMXCVIII" engraved inside braided rectangle; green cord with tassel through four rings around flask; man in armor with sword and shield on other side of flask
dimension: 9 1/2 x 5 x 1 1/2 in. (24.13 x 12.7 x 3.81 cm) (without tassels)
title: German-style (1550s) Powder Flask
